explanation: 根據規格書，getNamedDispatcher方法的參數是一個能被ServletContext找到的Servlet名稱，如果找得到該Servlet就包裝成RequestDispatcher物件並回傳，找不到則回傳null
question: In ServletContext.getNamedDispatcher(String arg0) arg0 is the

options.A: url of a servlet relative to the ServletRequest
options.B: url of a servlet relative to the Context
options.D: absolute url to any servlet in any Context
